item.description:
Come on out to Improv Boston this Sunday at 7 p.m. to see Active Ingredients perform improv comedy. Active Ingredients features Incubator members Nikki Frankel, Giovanni Alabiso, Alex Marzec, Doug Fitzgerald and Barbara Kremen. In addition, Friends of Gertrude will also be performing and there will be an open jam at the end of the show where audience members can come up to the stage and do some group improv games. Tickets are only $5.

Nikki is also having her Level III Grad Show that night so you can see her perform twice!!!
item.name: Active Ingredients perform at Open Jam
